sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROTHWELL or sometimes called Rowell, a town of the county of Northampton, in the hundred of the same name, seventy-nine miles from London. It has lost its market. The population amounted in 1801 to 1409, in 1811 to 1451, in 1821 to 1742, and in 1831 to 1875.
